name: My Review
author: Mike T.

sections.description:
My Review plugin helps you format your post as a review by making it easier for your readers to spot the good and the bad of the product/service you’re reviewing. You can also rate different aspects(price, quality, taste – you name it) of it according to your liking.
You can customize the formatting by modifying the template found in the plugin’s directory.

Tutorial

See the plugin page for examples how to use it.

Release Notes

1.2 – Added i18n support + new special tag (see the tutorial)

1.0.2 – Plugin is more php4 friendly now.

1.0.1 – Accents are properly handled in ratings names.

1.0 – First version released
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin (the ‘my-review’ directory) to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
